card.name: Abolish
card.text: You may discard a Plains card rather than pay Abolish's mana cost. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Agent of Shauku
card.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Alexi, Zephyr Mage
card.text: {X}{U}, {T}, Discard two cards: Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Alexi's Cloak
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature has shroud.

card.name: Aura Fracture
card.text: Sacrifice a land: Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Avatar of Fury
card.text: If an opponent controls seven or more lands, Avatar of Fury costs {6} less to cast. Flying {R}: Avatar of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Avatar of Hope
card.text: If you have 3 or less life, Avatar of Hope costs {6} less to cast. Flying Avatar of Hope can block any number of creatures.

card.name: Avatar of Might
card.text: If an opponent controls at least four more creatures than you, Avatar of Might costs {6} less to cast. Trample

card.name: Avatar of Will
card.text: If an opponent has no cards in hand, Avatar of Will costs {6} less to cast. Flying

card.name: Avatar of Woe
card.text: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs {6} less to cast. Fear {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Barbed Field
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

card.name: Blessed Wind
card.text: Target player's life total becomes 20.

card.name: Bog Elemental
card.text: Protection from white At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Bog Elemental unless you sacrifice a land.

card.name: Bog Glider
card.text: Flying {T}, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Branded Brawlers
card.text: Branded Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land. Branded Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.

card.name: Brutal Suppression
card.text: Activated abilities of nontoken Rebels cost an additional "Sacrifice a land" to activate.

card.name: Calming Verse
card.text: Destroy all enchantments you don't control. Then, if you control an untapped land, destroy all enchantments you control.

card.name: Celestial Convergence
card.text: Celestial Convergence enters the battlefield with seven omen counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an omen counter from Celestial Convergence. If there are no omen counters on Celestial Convergence, the player with the highest life total wins the game. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, the game is a draw.

card.name: Chilling Apparition
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Chilling Apparition. Whenever Chilling Apparition deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Chimeric Idol
card.text: {0}: Tap all lands you control. Chimeric Idol becomes a 3/3 Turtle artifact creature until end of turn.

card.name: Citadel of Pain
card.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, Citadel of Pain deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands he or she controls.

card.name: Coastal Hornclaw
card.text: Sacrifice a land: Coastal Hornclaw gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Coffin Puppets
card.text: Sacrifice two lands: Return Coffin Puppets from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Copper-Leaf Angel
card.text: Flying {T}, Sacrifice X lands: Put X +1/+1 counters on Copper-Leaf Angel.

card.name: Darba
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Darba unless you pay {G}{G}.

card.name: Death Charmer
card.text: Whenever Death Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life unless he or she pays {2}.

card.name: Denying Wind
card.text: Search target player's library for up to seven cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Despoil
card.text: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Devastate
card.text: Destroy target land. Devastate deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Diving Griffin
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Dual Nature
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller puts a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield. Whenever a nontoken creature leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens with the same name as that creature. When Dual Nature leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens put onto the battlefield with Dual Nature.

card.name: Elephant Resurgence
card.text: Each player puts a green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield. Those creatures have "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard."

card.name: Endbringer's Revel
card.text: {4}: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Any player may activate this ability but only any time he or she could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Entangler
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can block any number of creatures.

card.name: Excavation
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Excise
card.text: Exile target attacking creature unless its controller pays {X}.

card.name: Fault Riders
card.text: Sacrifice a land: Fault Riders gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Fen Stalker
card.text: Fen Stalker has fear as long as you control no untapped lands.

card.name: Fickle Efreet
card.text: Whenever Fickle Efreet attacks or blocks, flip a coin at end of combat. If you lose the flip, an opponent gains control of Fickle Efreet.

card.name: Flameshot
card.text: You may discard a Mountain card rather than pay Flameshot's mana cost. Flameshot deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

card.name: Flay
card.text: Target player discards a card at random. Then that player discards another card at random unless he or she pays {1}.

card.name: Flowering Field
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn."

card.name: Foil
card.text: You may discard an Island card and another card rather than pay Foil's mana cost. Counter target spell.

card.name: Forgotten Harvest
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a land card from your graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Glittering Lion
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion. {3}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lion loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion." Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Glittering Lynx
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx. {2}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lynx loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx." Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Greel, Mind Raker
card.text: {X}{B}, {T}, Discard two cards: Target player discards X cards at random.

card.name: Greel's Caress
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.

card.name: Gulf Squid
card.text: When Gulf Squid enters the battlefield, tap all lands target player controls.

card.name: Hazy Homunculus
card.text: Hazy Homunculus can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an untapped land.

card.name: Heightened Awareness
card.text: As Heightened Awareness enters the battlefield, discard your hand. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.

card.name: Hollow Warrior
card.text: Hollow Warrior can't attack or block unless you tap an untapped creature you control not declared as an attacking or blocking creature this combat.

card.name: Infernal Genesis
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Then he or she puts X 1/1 black Minion creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Inflame
card.text: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Jeweled Spirit
card.text: Flying Sacrifice two lands: Jeweled Spirit gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Jolrael, Empress of Beasts
card.text: {2}{G}, {T}, Discard two cards: All lands target player controls become 3/3 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

card.name: Jolrael's Favor
card.text: Flash Enchant creature {1}{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: Keldon Arsonist
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice two lands: Destroy target land.

card.name: Keldon Battlewagon
card.text: Trample Keldon Battlewagon can't block. When Keldon Battlewagon attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat. Tap an untapped creature you control: Keldon Battlewagon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the power of the creature tapped this way.

card.name: Keldon Berserker
card.text: Whenever Keldon Berserker attacks, if you control no untapped lands, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Keldon Firebombers
card.text: When Keldon Firebombers enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices all lands he or she controls except for three.

card.name: Latulla, Keldon Overseer
card.text: {X}{R}, {T}, Discard two cards: Latulla, Keldon Overseer deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Latulla's Orders
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to defending player, you may destroy target artifact that player controls.

card.name: Lesser Gargadon
card.text: Whenever Lesser Gargadon attacks or blocks, sacrifice a land.

card.name: Living Terrain
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 5/6 green Treefolk creature that's still a land.

card.name: Mageta the Lion
card.text: {2}{W}{W}, {T}, Discard two cards: Destroy all creatures except for Mageta the Lion. Those creatures can't be regenerated.

card.name: Mageta's Boon
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

card.name: Mana Vapors
card.text: Lands target player controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

card.name: Mercenary Informer
card.text: Mercenary Informer can't be the target of black spells or abilities from black sources. {2}{W}: Put target nontoken Mercenary on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Mine Bearer
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mine Bearer: Destroy target attacking creature.

card.name: Mirror Strike
card.text: All combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn by target unblocked creature is dealt to its controller instead.

card.name: Mungha Wurm
card.text: You can't untap more than one land during your untap step.

card.name: Nakaya Shade
card.text: {B}: Nakaya Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.

card.name: Noxious Field
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to each creature and each player."

card.name: Outbreak
card.text: You may discard a Swamp card rather than pay Outbreak's mana cost. Choose a creature type. All creatures of that type get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Overburden
card.text: Whenever a player puts a nontoken creature onto the battlefield, that player returns a land he or she controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Panic Attack
card.text: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.

card.name: Pit Raptor
card.text: Flying, first strike At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Pit Raptor unless you pay {2}{B}{B}.

card.name: Plague Fiend
card.text: Whenever Plague Fiend deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Plague Wind
card.text: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Psychic Theft
card.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. At the beginning of the next end step, if you haven't cast the card, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Quicksilver Wall
card.text: Defender {4}: Return Quicksilver Wall to its owner's hand. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Rebel Informer
card.text: Rebel Informer can't be the target of white spells or abilities from white sources. {3}: Put target nontoken Rebel on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Rethink
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.

card.name: Reveille Squad
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, if Reveille Squad is untapped, you may untap all creatures you control.

card.name: Rhystic Cave
card.text: {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color to your mana pool unless any player pays {1}. Activate this ability only any time you could cast an instant.

card.name: Rhystic Circle
card.text: {1}: Any player may pay {1}. If no one does, the next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Rhystic Deluge
card.text: {U}: Tap target creature unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Rhystic Lightning
card.text: Rhystic Lightning deals 4 damage to target creature or player unless that creature's controller or that player pays {2}. If he or she does, Rhystic Lightning deals 2 damage to the creature or player.

card.name: Rhystic Scrying
card.text: Draw three cards. Then, if any player pays {2}, discard three cards.

card.name: Rhystic Shield
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn. They get an additional +0/+2 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.

card.name: Rhystic Study
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

card.name: Rhystic Syphon
card.text: Unless target player pays {3}, he or she loses 5 life and you gain 5 life.

card.name: Rhystic Tutor
card.text: Unless any player pays {2}, search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ribbon Snake
card.text: Flying {2}: Ribbon Snake loses flying until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Ridgeline Rager
card.text: {R}: Ridgeline Rager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Root Cage
card.text: Mercenaries don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Samite Sanctuary
card.text: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Scoria Cat
card.text: Scoria Cat gets +3/+3 as long as you control no untapped lands.

card.name: Search for Survivors
card.text: Reorder your graveyard at random. An opponent chooses a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, exile it.

card.name: Searing Wind
card.text: Searing Wind deals 10 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Sheltering Prayers
card.text: Basic lands each player controls have shroud as long as that player controls three or fewer lands.

card.name: Shield Dancer
card.text: {2}{W}: The next time target attacking creature would deal combat damage to Shield Dancer this turn, that creature deals that damage to itself instead.

card.name: Shrouded Serpent
card.text: Whenever Shrouded Serpent attacks, defending player may pay {4}. If he or she doesn't, Shrouded Serpent can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Silt Crawler
card.text: When Silt Crawler enters the battlefield, tap all lands you control.

card.name: Snag
card.text: You may discard a Forest card rather than pay Snag's mana cost. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by unblocked creatures this turn.

card.name: Soul Charmer
card.text: Whenever Soul Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, you gain 2 life unless that creature's controller pays {2}.

card.name: Soul Strings
card.text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand unless any player pays {X}.

card.name: Spiketail Drake
card.text: Flying Sacrifice Spiketail Drake: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Spiketail Hatchling
card.text: Flying Sacrifice Spiketail Hatchling: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Spitting Spider
card.text: Reach Sacrifice a land: Spitting Spider deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Spore Frog
card.text: Sacrifice Spore Frog: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Spur Grappler
card.text: Spur Grappler gets +2/+1 as long as you control no untapped lands.

card.name: Squirrel Wrangler
card.text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Put two 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens onto the battlefield. {1}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Squirrel creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Steal Strength
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Stormwatch Eagle
card.text: Flying Sacrifice a land: Return Stormwatch Eagle to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sunken Field
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}."

card.name: Sword Dancer
card.text: {W}{W}: Target attacking creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Task Mage Assembly
card.text: When there are no creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice Task Mage Assembly. {2}: Task Mage Assembly deals 1 damage to target creature. Any player may activate this ability but only any time he or she could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Thresher Beast
card.text: Whenever Thresher Beast becomes blocked, defending player sacrifices a land.

card.name: Thrive
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.

card.name: Trenching Steed
card.text: Sacrifice a land: Trenching Steed gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Troubled Healer
card.text: Sacrifice a land: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Troublesome Spirit
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your end step, tap all lands you control.

card.name: Verdant Field
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."

card.name: Veteran Brawlers
card.text: Veteran Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land. Veteran Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.

card.name: Vintara Elephant
card.text: Trample {3}: Vintara Elephant loses trample until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Vintara Snapper
card.text: Vintara Snapper has shroud as long as you control no untapped lands.

card.name: Vitalizing Wind
card.text: Creatures you control get +7/+7 until end of turn.

card.name: Wall of Vipers
card.text: Defender {3}: Destroy Wall of Vipers and target creature it's blocking. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Well of Discovery
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control no untapped lands, draw a card.

card.name: Well of Life
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control no untapped lands, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Whip Sergeant
card.text: {R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Whipstitched Zombie
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Whipstitched Zombie unless you pay {B}.

card.name: Wild Might
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. That creature gets an additional +4/+4 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.

card.name: Windscouter
card.text: Flying Whenever Windscouter attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat.

card.name: Wing Storm
card.text: Wing Storm deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of creatures with flying that player controls.

card.name: Wintermoon Mesa
card.text: Wintermoon Mesa enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wintermoon Mesa: Tap two target lands.

card.name: Withdraw
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Then return another target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Zerapa Minotaur
card.text: First strike {2}: Zerapa Minotaur loses first strike until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
